name: zap-cannon
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Powerful and sure to cause paralysis, but inaccurate.
flavor_text.emerald: Powerful and sure to cause paralysis, but inaccurate.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: An electric blast is fired like a cannon to inflict damage and paralyze.
